sentence.Network_en: The direction of the prevailing winds should be taken into account.
sentence.Network_cn: 应该将盛行风的方向考虑在内。

sentence.Network_en: He broke from prevailing orthodoxies and asked the awkward questions.
sentence.Network_cn: 他抛开盛行的正统观念，问了一些难以回答的问题。

sentence.Network_en: An uneasy calm is reported to be prevailing in the area.
sentence.Network_cn: 据报道,该地区弥漫着一种令人不安的平静.

entry.def: The prevailing wind in an area is the type of wind that blows over that area most of the time.

example.ex: The direction of the prevailing winds should be taken into account.
example.tran: 应该将盛行风的方向考虑在内。

means.word_mean: 2. encountered generally especially at the present time;

sentences.sentence: "the prevailing opinion was that a trade war could be averted"
"the most prevalent religion in our area"
"speculation concerning the books author was rife"

auth_sentence.content: It was seriously out of step with prevailing trends.
auth_sentence.res_content: It was seriously out of step with prevailing trends.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It was seriously out of step with prevailing trends.

auth_sentence.content: At prevailing prices the mines are incurring substantial losses.
auth_sentence.res_content: At prevailing prices the mines are incurring substantial losses.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: At prevailing prices the mines are incurring substantial losses.

auth_sentence.content: The prevailing conditions on that crystalline morning were unfavorable.
auth_sentence.res_content: The prevailing conditions on that crystalline morning were unfavorable.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The prevailing conditions on that crystalline morning were unfavorable.

sentences.en: The prevailing current flows from east to west.
sentences.cn: 主道的水流是自东往西的。

sentences.en: Yellow is the prevailing color in her room.
a prevailing set of cultural values
sentences.cn: 一套盛行的文化价值观

sentences.en: He wore his hair in the prevailing fashion.
sentences.cn: 他的头发梳的是当时盛行的发型。

sentences.en: Plague was then prevailing in that city.
sentences.cn: 当时瘟疫正在该城流行。
